title: 15 rules for rebuilding the world - Wired mag article
content:

author: edwh

comments.content:
Edward -- thanks for pointing this out. Sounds like a huge volume to slowly consume, but this abridged version shows that it can be read by all interested in design and order. I especially like point 15:

> * * *
> **quote:**
> 
> Designs should be connected and complementary, not egocentric and isolated.
> 
> * * *
> !-/quote-!\>!-quote-!\>

Sounds like the perfect recipe for any project (design) that hopes to succeed.
